attributes.action: Halt the closure of post offices and to support the retention of Post Offices.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe that the services
provided by post offices are valuable and support a vision of rural
communities that are economically,
socially and culturally active. We note with concern the proposals
of the UK Government to reduce the
size of the post office network and we will take a proactive approach to
support the retention of Post Offices and will oppose any proposed closures that would leave communities without a local post office.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
